short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your sobriety progress and see health benefits as you stay on track.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sobriety Tracker is a simple and effective Chrome extension designed to help you stay motivated on your journey to quit alcohol. Each time you open a new tab, it tracks the time since your last drink and displays the health benefits you've gained along the way. Whether you're looking to improve your physical health, mental well-being, or overall quality of life, this extension provides an easy way to stay on track.

Key Features

Track the number of years, months, days, and minutes since you last consumed alcohol.

Receive health benefit updates over time, from improved sleep and liver health to better cardiovascular function and reduced cancer risk.

Reset your progress if you start over, with a simple input for your last drink date and time.

Sleek, user-friendly interface designed to keep you motivated.

Disclaimer: This tool is for informational use only and not a substitute for professional advice. Please consult a healthcare provider for support.

Start tracking your sobriety today and experience the positive changes as you move towards a healthier, alcohol-free life!
